default.title: Sorry, something went wrong there

common.projectForbiddenOperation: As a project you are not able to proceed with this operation

homeGridCurrentGlmLock.tooltipText: Effective lock (EL) is the part of your locked GLM that is currently earning rewards. Equal to your current balance, if that is unchanged during the ongoing epoch. Increase lock & EL increases proportionally to epoch time remaining. Decrease lock & this amount is removed from EL for the epoch.

lockGlmBudgetBox.approve2Transactions: Please approve 2 transactions in your wallet. The first (required only once and for locking) allows ERC-20 tokens, and the second locks / unlocks GLM.
lockGlmBudgetBox.stakeWillUpdate: Your stake will update when the transaction is confirmed
lockGlmBudgetBox.waitingForTransactionHash: Waiting for transaction hash from Etherscan...

modalWithdrawEth.withdrawalsDistributedEpoch: Withdrawals are distributed when Epoch {{currentEpoch}} ends

homeGridUQScore.scoreTooLow: Score too low? Visit the Octant Passport dashboard

modalCalculatingYourUniqueness.calculatingYourUniquenessStep1:
To prove your uniqueness your need a <0>Gitcoin Passport score of 20 or higher.

If you have this your donations will attract the maximum amount of match funding. If not, maximum match funding will be set to 20%.

You can increase your score in a couple of different ways.
modalCalculatingYourUniqueness.calculatingYourUniquenessStep2:
You can go to our <0>Passport dashboard and add stamps to the score for your Octant address.

If your Passport score is not on your primary address, you can delegate your score from another address with a 20+ Passport score.

You can only do this once, and it must be done before allocating to benefit the current epoch.
modalCalculatingYourUniqueness.calculatingYourUniquenessStep3:
Delegation will not link your addresses or compromise your privacy in any way.

We require proof of uniqueness to defend against sybil attacks as we have switched to a quadratic funding model.

To learn more, check out Gitcoin’s handy guide to <0>scoring 20, for humans.

modalCalculatingUQScore.delegationFailedText: Delegation failed — your score needs to be 20 or higher. Please try another address
modalCalculatingUQScore.delegationMessageToSign: Delegation of UQ score from {{delegationSecondaryAddress}} to {{delegationPrimaryAddress}}

patronMode.patronModeSignatureMessage: Signing this message will {{state}} patron mode for address {{address}}.
patronMode.firstParagraph:
This mode is for token holders
who want to support Octant.
patronMode.secondParagraph: It disables and removes all personal allocations and project donations.
patronMode.thirdParagraph: All rewards go directly to the matching fund with no action required by the patron. Learn more in the <0>Docs</0>.
patronMode.fourthParagraphEnable:
Slide the switch below all the way to
the right to enable patron mode.
patronMode.fourthParagraphDisable:
Slide the switch below all the way to
the left to disable patron mode.

rewardsCalculator.modalHeaderTooltip: Calculator assumes GLM is locked before allocation window and remains locked until the next window. Estimated match funding is based on 100% of rewards being allocated to projects.

allocationInfoBoxes.decisionWindowClosed: The decision window is now closed. Allocating funds is not possible.
allocationInfoBoxes.connectWallet: In order to manipulate allocation values and vote, please connect your wallet first.

allocationSummary.tooltip: <0>Leverage</0> shows the multiplier effect of your donation to the projects you chose. Note that leverage will fluctuate significantly and might be very different at the end of the allocation window.

allocationInputsRewardsAvailable.resetAllocations: Reset allocations to manually edit this project

boxGlmLock.tooltipText: Effective lock (EL) is the part of your locked GLM that is currently earning rewards. Equal to your current balance, if that is unchanged during the ongoing epoch. Increase lock & EL increases proportionally to epoch time remaining. Decrease lock & this amount is removed from EL for the epoch.

budgetBox.stakeWillUpdate: Your stake will update when the transaction is confirmed
budgetBox.waitingForTransactionHash: Waiting for transaction hash from Etherscan...

donors.donationsNotEnabled: Donations are not enabled in this epoch

success.text: Your locked balance will update after tx confirmation. <0>View on Etherscan</0>

notApproved.label: Please approve two wallet transactions
notApproved.text: One to allow ERC-20 tokens, the other to deposit GLM.

historyList.emptyHistory: You haven’t made any transactions yet

allocationTooltips.leverageUnknown: We do not know the leverage for this past allocation.
allocationTooltips.finalMatchFunding: Once allocation period has finished we know the exact amount of your matched funding your donation attracted, so we show that rather than just your estimated leverage amount.
allocationTooltips.leverage: Leverage shows the multiple of your donation the projects you chose will receive in matched funding. Note that it may change wildly during an epoch, and be very different to your final matched funding.

tos.text: I agree to the <0> Terms of Service </0>

withdrawEth.withdrawalsDistributedEpoch: Withdrawals are distributed when Epoch {{currentEpoch}} ends

footer.octantText:
Octant is a <0>Golem Foundation project,
launched in 2023.

meta.description: Octant is a platform that enables users to lock GLM, earn ETH rewards, and fund projects they care about

confirmChanges.title: Please confirm your allocation to keep your changes

lowUQScoreModal.header: Your UQ score is too low!
lowUQScoreModal.text: If you allocate with this UQ score, you will receive <0>80% less match funding</0> than if you are verified. You cannot change this after allocation. Are you sure you want to proceed?
lowUQScoreModal.checkboxLabel: I understand I will receive 20% of the maximum match funding

multisigSignatureToast.title: Multi-sig: signature needed
multisigSignatureToast.message: At least one signature is required to start allocation. Please do not close Octant.

text.desktop: Add projects and use the slider to divide rewards between yourself and your chosen projects
text.mobile: Add projects and use the slider to divide rewards between yourself & your chosen projects

title.desktop: Your uniqueness score is too low
title.mobile: Your UQ score is too low

text.desktop: You will receive only 20% of the maximum match funding. Visit <0>Settings</0> to recalculate it before you allocate and improve your match funding
text.mobile: You will receive only 20% of the max. match funding. Visit <0>Settings</0> to recalculate before you allocate

text.desktop: Rewards you allocate to yourself can be withdrawn to your wallet here in the Earn view once the allocation window has closed
text.mobile: Rewards you allocate to yourself can be withdrawn to your wallet here in the Earn view

text.desktop: Please connect your wallet to get started. You will need it to lock GLM, receive rewards and to prove your uniqueness
text.mobile: Please connect your wallet to Octant in order to participate in this and future epochs

text.desktop: Lock GLM for at least one complete epoch to earn ETH rewards you can donate (and get match funding) or allocate to yourself
text.mobile: Lock GLM for at least 1 complete epoch to earn ETH rewards you can donate or withdraw

text.desktop: Unallocated rewards will be swept back for restaking at the end of this allocation window, so don't forget to allocate!
text.mobile: Unallocated rewards will be swept back for restaking at the end of this allocation window

connectWalletTip.title: Connect your wallet
connectWalletTip.text: To see your own personal stats here, <0/>you will need to connect your wallet

usingTheApp.text: Before we can go any further, please read the terms of service and click the checkbox below to agree with them.

signingTheTerms.text: At least one signature is required to agree to the Terms of Service. Please do not close Octant until this is completed.

welcomeToOctant.text:
If you locked GLM last epoch, you'll have rewards available during this allocation window, which runs until {{date}}.

If not, lock some GLM in the Earn view, and explore the projects for this epoch to get an idea of what Octant is all about.

earnRewards.text:
ETH rewards are earned based on a weighted average, so the more GLM you lock and the longer you lock it for, the more you earn.

You can unlock at any time but doing so will reduce your rewards. Use the calculator in the Earn view to estimate potential rewards.

donateToProjects.text:
Check out the lineup for Epoch {{epoch}} in the Projects view. Tap a project tile to read its details and donate to your favourites.

Your donation will be fund matched by Golem Foundation. Just tap the heart to add a project to the Allocate view where you can donate.

slideIt.text:
If you have rewards, use the slider in the Allocate view to easily divide them between projects or yourself.

To change your choices at any time during allocation, just click Edit, make some changes and reconfirm in your wallet.

welcomeToOctant.text:
Octant is a Golem Foundation experiment in decentralised governance and funding public good projects.

To get started, lock some GLM in the Earn view, and explore the projects for this epoch to get an idea of what Octant is all

earnRewards.text:
ETH rewards are earned based on a weighted average, so the more GLM you lock and the longer you lock it for, the more you earn.

You can unlock at any time but doing so will reduce your rewards. Use the calculator in the Earn view to estimate potential rewards.

getReady.text:
Lock your GLM, check out the projects to support and get ready for the next allocation window which opens on {{date}}.

Visit <0>Octant.build, join the <1>Discord or get project updates on <2>Twitter.

project.loadingProblem: Loading of this project encountered a problem.

text.desktop: Save projects to the Allocate view with the heart icon so you can donate rewards to them. You can also slide any allocate tile to remove them
text.mobile: Save projects to the Allocate view with the heart icon so you can donate rewards to them

You can only do this once, and it must be done before allocating to benefit the current epoch.

We require proof of uniqueness to defend against sybil attacks as we have switched to a quadratic funding model.

To learn more, check out Gitcoin’s handy guide to <0>scoring 20, for humans.
